alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Gilchrist; Hamilton; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 10:41PM EDT until June 14 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL GILCHRIST...COLUMBIA...SOUTHERN SUWANNEE AND SOUTHEASTERN HAMILTON COUNTIES... At 1041 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Belmont to 6 miles southeast of Wellborn to 6 miles south of Obrien, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lake City, White Springs, Bell, Ichetucknee Spring, Columbia, Fort White, Winfield, Suwannee Valley, Belmont and Mcalpin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
